Find answers to common questions or get in touch with our support team

Frequently Asked Questions

What is ASAP and what does it do? ▼

ASAP is a food & groceries delivery platform that connects you with local restaurants and stores. We make it easy to order your favorite meals and essential items, delivering them right to your doorstep quickly and reliably. With our wide network of partners and efficient delivery system, you can get what you need, when you need it.

How do I get started with ASAP? ▼

To get started, simply download the ASAP app and create an account using your email address. Once registered, you can browse nearby restaurants and stores, place orders, and track your deliveries in real-time through our user-friendly interface.

Can I access ASAP on mobile devices? ▼

Yes, ASAP is available as a mobile app for both iOS and Android devices. You can download our app from the App Store or Google Play Store to enjoy the full ASAP experience, including real-time order tracking and push notifications for delivery updates.

How do I have my Restaurant or Store added to ASAP? ▼

If you'd like to have your restaurant or store added to ASAP, you can sign up as a business partner by submitting your details on the ASAP website. Our team will review your application and get back to you with next steps.

What happens if I forget my password? ▼

You can reset your password by clicking the "Forgot Password" link on the login page. You'll receive an email with instructions to create a new password.
